  • Field Details

    • REGISTERED

      public static final int REGISTERED
      This route has been registered.

      This event is synchronously delivered after the route has been registered with the Router.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • UNREGISTERING

      public static final int UNREGISTERING
      This route is in the process of being unregistered.

      This event is synchronously delivered before the route has completed unregistering.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • RouteEvent

      public RouteEvent(int type, org.forgerock.json.resource.Router router, org.forgerock.services.routing.RouteMatcher<org.forgerock.json.resource.Request> routeMatcher)
      Creates a new service event object.
      Parameters:
      type - The event type.
      router - A Router object where a change had occurred in.
      routeMatcher - A RouteMatcher object that had a lifecycle change.

  • Method Details

    • getRouteMatcher

      public org.forgerock.services.routing.RouteMatcher<org.forgerock.json.resource.Request> getRouteMatcher()
      Returns a Route that had a change occur in its lifecycle.

      This Route is the source of the event.

      Returns:
      Route that had a lifecycle change.

    • getRouter

      public org.forgerock.json.resource.Router getRouter()
      Returns a Router where a change had occurred in.

      Returns:
      Router that had the change.

    • getType

      public int getType()
      Returns the type of event. The event type values are:
      • REGISTERED
      • UNREGISTERING
      Returns:
      Type of service lifecycle change.
